result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shalonda Michelle McCoy

records.addlTxt: Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3. No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Previous no contact order with HJH is continued by the court.

Defendant Shalonda Michelle McCoy appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Kylie Kaltenberg appeared by video for Shalonda Michelle McCoy. Attorney Sara Beth Hill appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant. ($1,500.00 signature bond) LW
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for a final pretrial.  Defendant does not appear. Court issued a bench warrant.  Court forfeited $1,500.00 PR bond.
Jury trial date of 7-13-22 is vacated.
Received and Filed. State's Motion in Limine

Defendant Shalonda Michelle McCoy in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shalonda Michelle McCoy appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Status Conference held.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and jury trial.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Final pre-trial scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 01:30 pm.  Jury trial scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Shalonda Michelle McCoy in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shalonda Michelle McCoy appeared by video means with Attorney.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Calendar Call held.  Defendant present in Court, Court withdrew previously stayed bench warrant.  Defense counsel requests status conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court.  Mark O Thomson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court for a pretrial conference.  Defendant does not appear.  Attorney Fuentes was just appointed to the case and has not had contact with the defendant yet. Court issued a bench warrant STAYED until the next court date.
Case is adjourned to 4-26-22 at 1:30 pm for calendar call.
  This hearing will be streamed live on DAcast:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Calendar call scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
No contact order signed and filed.
Court ordered Justice Point Pretrial Services LEVEL 2 SUPERVISION.  Court reminders.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with DG; HJH

Defendant Shalonda Michelle McCoy in court with attorney Alejandro A Lockwood.  Defendant Shalonda Michelle McCoy in custody.  Erin Michelle Karshen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Shalonda Michelle McCoy appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
